meanings.sent1: The factory desulfured the fuel to make it cleaner.
meanings.sent2: The chemist desulfured the compound to improve its quality.
meanings.sent3: The magician desulfured the potion, turning it into a harmless liquid.
meanings.sent4: She desulfured the soil, transforming it into a fertile bed for plants.
meanings.sent5: The process of desulfuring the water made it safe for consumption.

meanings.sent1: The desulfured fuel burned cleanly in the engine.
meanings.sent2: The desulfured rubber had a less pungent smell.
meanings.sent3: The desulfured air felt fresher and lighter to breathe.
meanings.sent4: The desulfured metal was now suitable for sensitive applications.
meanings.sent5: The desulfured fabric was gentle on the skin and eco-friendly.
